Title: Directs the public service commission to review cellular service within the state
Summary: Enacts the "cellular mapping act"; requires the public service commission to review cellular services within the state; requires the expansion of cellular services.
LawCode: Add ยง91-b, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to directing the public service commission to review cellular services within the state
